twitch_info.title: I Wanna Ponder - 100% | Full Playthrough (Part 9/9)
twitch_info.description:
98% -> 100%
Here we tackle the final two puzzles in the game, Lasers 10 and Rotation 10.

message.body: oh hey ou're actually on now
hi wolfi, how goes the game? :)
i know when i've tried reconnecting to twitch too fast it hasn't picked it up
oh jeez ok didn't realise thst why you went offline
ponder really makes you blue screen a lot huh
why is that laser flicking on/off
yeah when yellow is on, blue is okay, but if he makes blue hit the yellow its no longer valid so blue goes off
but i'm not sure why this is lagging that much
it might be because they're going back and forth between splitters
the script that calculates it all caps it all out to try and stop that but if you go back and forth between splitters with a mirror it probably creates too many beams
only 4 more people need to send me bits (including me) ðŸ‘€
cyan = blue + green, yellow = red + green, purple = red + blue, white = all
damn it, did wolfi dc again?
it loses some sync when the game lags wildly
because it could be coded better than it is
but when i was making the music system in the game i was just doing random crap without thinking about it
remember what worked in previous levels
there's really only one way to get the blocks together so just need to figure that out
and yeah, the hint was how to do that
yeah that one won't work because its a middle gap
get the 3 cyan blocks next to each other
man you're still on this game
i played around with it for a while
what i could make of it
is that kurath is a GOD at puzzles
i'd go back one move and really think it out
well i meant like right back where you were
puzzles are like anything else to some degree though, just a matter of practice
i've been doing/making puzzles for a really long time
i want you to really think through this next move
issue is i dont see how you're supposed to get to the stuck cyan block
yeah you can definitely get some weird block arrangements but nothing should be unfixable
whats left btw? just this and the lasers 10 one?
yeah that hurts when you go from not knowing what you want to try to knowing what you want to try but being unable to set it up

so i used to have more restrictions around letting you move between rotators and after coming back to it several weeks later to testplay it myself i couldn't actually beat the level anymore and ended up nerfing it a lot
this was a true mess prior to that
although to be fair one of those restrictions wouldn't stop you because it was a 1f jump
i forget which level werumy had last, i know near did matching 10 last and now you have lasers
it's almost like different people struggle with different puzzles
that's good to hear, that level was really hard to make
so atleast something came of it
it's almost morning for you then PogChamp
dude, i can nearly finally remix the avoidance
just gotta finish this GDQ stuff first
gonna have to really dig deep for a good uk themed bogus hint for this

Wolfi's Fangame Funanzapalooza is the 3rd in my fangame challenge series, featuring 52 fangames of increasing difficulty made by a wide variety of makers. Check out the list here - https://goo.gl/frNVJC
lets hope it doesn't beat it
why does the laser flash sometimes?
if he makes it where it does something it shouldn't which therefore disables a block and makes it do something it should again, then repeat
sorry my egyptian knowledge is very rusty
helps sometimes to visualize the whole light as a particle thing and imagine its path as it hits each object
yeah that one's a multistep problem
kurath, you did a good job building on your puzzles
sometimes thats what you want though
its like when you finished TIS and breathed a sigh of relief playing 40 difficulty adventures
I think you are close wolfie
on my way to uni for a test EHEHE
looks like you're facing a tougher test than I
do you want an answer to that question because there's a surprisingly accurate one
because for real, if this puzzle is europe the problem is definitely the channel tunnel
the hints are getting harder than the puzzle
because the green laser is the only one he doesn't have
it's ok wolfie, I can hold your hand
what is the channel tunnel? Is it how you go from UK to mainland?
chunnel connects the UK to france, yeah
can you run the green into the red?
ok, so if that's the case, then kurath's hint does make a little more sense now
Does the spot where two bricks touch at the corners block lasers?
you moved that one mirror beyond the green block
no Ruerell I don't think so
wolfi can i give a hint
listen, all he needs to know is that the channel tunnel is where his problem is pooks
well its not the only problem, but its one of them
the thing about the channel tunnel is it goes both ways and is close to a 45 degree angle
well the water channel itself is much more straight
I can't stop staring at these cute mushrooms
kurath, I think I am understanding your hints better and that scares me
jfc i'm glad i tapped out before lasers
wolfi, would you like a fun fact about galaxy friends?
i may have forgotten to turn on precision collision for all non-red fruit
so yeah, that fight is actually just a bunch of squares
same, it certainly didn't feel like that when i was making it
to be fair there are a lot of ways to close this one out so you do just need to find one
to figure this one out, you really need laser-sharp focus
you did this to yourself already lol
you can diagonalize the red to re-hit it
I wasn't sure if I could help you get back
its a good thing block reformation is not in fact faster than the speed of light
well it used to be but then rather than the rave effects you just get an infinite loop and the game freezes
wouldn't it be cool if it was though?
face your fears wolfie. Break everything ruuBad
"i don't wanna" is the saddest thing a fangamer can say
you could send a splitter to that block, right?
sorry, not meant to be giving suggestions, i got eager
now that is some cosmic brain stuff
that diagonal to the left... lol
clearly the hardest fangame in the challenge
if you move the mirrors for the green lasser down you caan take the red up from thee bottom
seph will guide you, his game has a few lasers in it
oh yea I think there's lasers in there
you could make green hit itself without the blue block removed
and i'm suggesting that not because its necessarily the right thing to do but because its going all out
or rather, hit the yellow trigger, not itself
there's actually so many more wacky approaches to this level than i'd realized
for what its worth the intended solution at no point requires you to rearrange every death but cosmo's definitely does
just maens its not necessary but its not a deal breaker
You should have come back with a fresh cat
you were doing it with blue
are you trying to get the lights to turn white and combine on the block at the top left?
yeah the ultimate goal is to get to the warp which means he has to hit both cyan targets which is the cyan one and the white one
i am surprised you want to finish this, wolfiPuzzles is a thing :P
this is like sailing a boat across the channel instead of keeping the tunnel open
that's the hollywolfie that I know and love
that is the hollywood strat for sure
gg indeed, yet another solution for that one
what was the original solution to that one?
it doesn't really comprise the whole process though, just how it ends up
you can goto the credist and find the easter egg in them
now we PARTY sParty sParty sParty sParty sParty ThisPartySucks ThisPartySucks sParty sParty
i THOUGHT that it was supposed to turn white

Wolfi's Fangame Funanzapalooza is the 3rd in my fangame challenge series, featuring 52 fangames of increasing difficulty made by a wide variety of makers. Check out the list here - https://goo.gl/frNVJC
it was a deal, he knows
but you still haven't found the actual easter egg
Dude can anyone imagine if there were 2 Nals?
that easter egg could only be described as....
damn that was still only phase 4
although cosmo was actually really good at blocks
and he did it with logic rather than trial and error
the second "step" was always the hardest
well the first hint was very helpful
and gave me a way to go
i don't know what it is about that one that people find hard
i should've fixed that but i wanted to leave pathing open to cheese anyway
feel like i did a dumb jump
some people really have a hard time with botkid6
since lasers 8 and kidamari 8 took some work too
7 and 9 for sudoku are both intro levels to some degree again though, so they end up easier
what solution did you get for lasers 10
and involved jamming a bender into a spike
i didn't even think that was possible
this is such a bad idea
yeah anything with more than doors seems very monkaOMEGA
you can shoot spinners to reverse their direction
its the only non text one
with the extra over his face
it was certainly a close one
might come back when kakki rolls around?
cheer10000 thanks for the entertainment, it was worth making it to watch some of those struggles
yeah those aren't really important though
i'm looking forward it too, too bad its making 0 progress atm
i missed some of this but happy that I got to see some wolfiePuzzles
